TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDatabaseModelFactory
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IDatabaseModelFactory

Docs.summary: A service typically implemented by database providers to reverse engineer a database into a .

remarks.para: The service lifetime is . This means that each instance will use its own instance of this service. The implementation may depend on other services registered with any lifetime. The implementation does not need to be thread-safe.
See Reverse engineering (scaffolding) an existing database, and EF Core design-time services for more information and examples.
